articles.title: Northern Ireland boss Kenny Shiels claims it would be a 'FAILURE' were England not to win Euro 2022 - Daily Mail
articles.description: Northern Ireland boss Kenny Shiels insisted it would be a 'massive failure' if England did not win Euro 2022 after seeing his team brushed aside by the host nation in a crushing 5-0 defeat.
articles.content:
